item.title: Community Outreach: Training student-athletes at Don Bosco Ashalayam
item.author: academyibsports@gmail.com (Ishwar Bhati)
item.description: Launched a community outreach program offering basketball training to underprivileged youth and teaching life skills like teamwork and discipline through sports.
